20 Dec 2024

New Science Fiction & Fantasy Novels for Fans of Daniel Arenson

Are you a fan of Daniel Arenson’s epic worlds, unforgettable characters, and heart-pounding adventures? If you’ve been captivated by his sweeping tales of dragons, alien invasions, and heroism against impossible odds, you’re in for a treat. The science fiction and fantasy genres are bursting with fresh releases that deliver the same kind of breathtaking magic and emotional resonance.

A Currency of Control (The N-ergy Cycle Book 2)

by Charles Brass

Release Date: October 31 2024

Spared the flames of decoherence, Lady of the Leaves Lake-Ellen Redwood travels a new Path—that of a possessed, for rooted within her is a being of immense power. On the run, she and a fellow possessed seek a place where they can live in peace, and clues from her home country’s dark past hint such salvation lies in distant, dangerous lands.

Buy on Amazon

Clouds in the Future (The Great War of the Worlds Book 2)

by Eric Goebelbecker

Release Date: December 15 2024

Christian survived the first Martian attack due to his grandfather’s sacrifice. They return and he joined a group of German soldiers that fled the Somme. Now he’s in post apocalyptic Paris as the aliens close in. Clouds in the Future continues the Great War of the Worlds series in a Europe ravaged by two wars.

Buy on Amazon

The Freedom Fleet

by Daniel Arenson

Release Date: December 17 2024

What if WW2 were fought in space? In 1944, a secret Nazi experiment split the universe in two. In our universe, we won. Hitler died. But in a parallel universe, the Nazis discovered the atom bomb first… and conquered the world. Now it’s 2207, and the two universes collide. It’s WW2 again. This time in space. From a USA Today bestselling author.

Buy on Amazon

Finding Idyllium

by N. Joseph Glass

Release Date: November 27 2024

Beyond the 4.5 billion Marc must save, the parallel world of Idyllium is his daughter’s only hope. Ethical lines blur for politicians, soldiers, and civilians. Loyalties are challenged. From a high-profile assassination to taking down the defensive grid of a peaceful planet, Marc’s mission takes desperate turns, dividing members of his team.

Buy on Amazon

Declining Empire (Owning a Spacebar Book 2)

by John Walker

Release Date: December 17 2024

A terrorist attack. A daring raid. Ambitious individuals hungry for power. The Crossroads are in trouble.

Buy on Amazon

Aftermath 4 (The Nuclear War Series)

by Bobby Akart

Release Date: December 5 2024

Was any part of the world spared from the aftermath of Nuclear War? As Nuclear Winter wrapped its gloomy arms around the planet, man experienced a state of anguished misery and desolation. Was there an oasis? A place of refuge? Could they get there? Remember, the aftermath, nuclear winter, took no prisoners. The living will envy the dead.

Buy on Amazon
